Data Fields
fifo_peek_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » FIFO Buffer

FIFO Peek data. More...

#include <fifo.h>

Detailed Description

This is used when peeking at data in the FIFO

Data Fields

ssize_t loc
 The location to peek.
 
char * buf
 A pointer to the buffer to receive peek bytes.
 
ssize_t nbyte
 The number of bytes to peek.
